name: Bugs 'n Bog
description:
[DOWNLOAD BELOW] Play as a frog waiter in this restaurant management game. Serve Ant Egg Boba, Fried Spider Legs and even HornWorm Hotdogs! Make sure to keep your customers happy, otherwise you'll lose your 5-star reputation.  Click with your mouse to move in game

Created as a part of Mini Jam 106: Frogs²

Developed By

  • Trinity Beltran 
    • Game Artist | Animator, Characters, Background
  • Frogletpie
